subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After being sent to Class AAA Norfolk to start the season, Matt Wieters, the Orioles’ top catching prospect, is almost certain to be in the majors before the All-Star break.
snippet: After being sent to Class AAA Norfolk to start the season, Matt Wieters, the Orioles’ top catching prospect, is almost certain to be in the majors before the All-Star break.
